trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_SEQ_00<tab>G'raha Tia regards his comrades in solemn silence.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_TODO_01<tab>Pass through the portal and wait for your comrades at the designated location.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_TODO_02<tab>Continue waiting for your comrades.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_TODO_03<tab>Speak with G'raha Tia.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_TODO_04<tab>Search the area for denizens.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_TODO_05<tab>Search the area for denizens.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_TODO_06<tab>Speak with G'raha Tia.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_TODO_07<tab>Gather information at Base Omicron.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_TODO_08<tab>Speak with G'raha Tia.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Never have I felt such emptiness. It's as if a part of me is gone...
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>...I'm fine, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALISAIE_000_006<tab>Like I said, our quest doesn't end here.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_010<tab>Are you all ready to continue on?
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_011<tab>Then let us make for where that light shone. Y'shtola and Urianger have opened the way for us.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALISAIE_000_020<tab>Some manner of Ea device. If our friends awakened it, then it should be safe to use.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_025<tab>Judging by the direction, this should be the place.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>Yes, I can feel it! The aether emanating from the arcane pattern!
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALPHINAUD_000_031<tab>This is a portal, and no mistake. Let us see where it leads.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>What manner of place awaits us, I wonder...
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_Q1_000_041<tab>Travel through the portal?
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_BALLOON_000_050<tab><whirr> Intruder alert.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_BALLOON_000_051<tab>Eliminate. Eliminate.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>Amazing... Yet another civilization...
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>Attacked as soon as you arrived!? Not the most welcoming of places, is it...
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_062<tab>We must try to find denizens who are amenable to conversation.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALPHINAUD_000_063<tab>We should also get the lay of the land, see how far we can go.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALISAIE_000_064<tab>I'll help Alphinaud with that. In the meantime, you and G'raha can search for friendlier folk.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_065<tab>Apart from hostile beings, take care with your footing. I mislike the look of this terrain.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALISAIE_000_066<tab>Not knowing what the locals are like, you'd best take care yourselves. We'll find you once we've finished exploring.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_070<tab>I expect the twins will seek the outermost bounds of the isle, so I propose we search the central area.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_071<tab>There are machines patrolling here and there. Sentinels, in all likelihood.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_072<tab>Like those you encountered, they will most certainly attack any who venture too close.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_073<tab>So let us avoid them, and look for others that appear more approachable.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>You see naught but patrolling machines in the area. They do not seem inclined to nonviolent intercourse.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_POPMESSAGE_000_090<tab>You are under attack!
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_BALLOON_000_095<tab><blip> <bloop>
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_BALLOON_000_096<tab>Hello, hello. Hello, hello.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_BALLOON_000_100<tab>Shutting down... Bzzzt...
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_BALLOON_000_101<tab>Hell...o... Hell...o.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M032_000_105<tab>Bzzzt... Additional entity detected.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_110<tab>Look, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The machines here do not appear hostile. Let's see if we can communicate with them...
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_111<tab>Begging your pardon, but we are searching for the denizens of this star.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M032_000_112<tab>Bzzzt... Unknown life-forms detected. Assigning generic label: interplanetary travelers.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M032_000_113<tab>Greetings and welcome to the planet. <blip> <bloooooop>
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_114<tab>The planet...what? Could you please repeat that?
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M032_000_115<tab>It appears your hearing organ is unable to process the name in our tongue. It may be translated into yours as “Alphatron.”
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M032_000_116<tab>Our people, meanwhile, are called the Omicrons, and you stand within one of our outposts.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_117<tab>The Omicrons, you say... And what is it that you do here?
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M032_000_118<tab>We are preparing for war.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M032_000_119<tab>As we presently do not have a designated target, you have nothing to fear.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M032_000_120<tab>Should your star become designated, however, you will be taken into custody and or terminated.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_121<tab>Not a little frightening, these Omicrons, but at least they seem to be forthright...
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_122<tab>I will see what else I can learn from this fellow, if you could try speaking with the others?
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_130<tab>Go on and try speaking with the other units here. With our combined findings, perhaps we can piece together the state of affairs for the Omicrons.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M032_000_135<tab>The rules of engagement forbid the harming of neutral travelers. As long as you abide by our laws, you need not fear for your lives.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_N0055_000_140<tab><blip> <bloop> Autonomous weapon deployment: complete. Vanguard armament upgrade: complete. Munition levels: satisfactory.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_N0055_000_141<tab>Combat readiness assessment: nominal. Awaiting instructions from Sir.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_N0055_000_142<tab>Maintaining state of combat readiness.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_N0055_000_145<tab>Awaiting instructions from Sir. Please specify target... Please specify target...
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M097_000_150<tab>Bzzzt... Greetings, traveler. When venturing outside the outpost, beware malfunctioning units.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M097_000_151<tab>They do not heed Sir's commands, and indiscriminately attack all non-Omicrons.

TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M097_000_152<tab>For the avoidance of confusion, be advised that “Sir” is the alias of Stigma-1. Sir issues instructions to our forces as the foremost of the six strategic matrices that bear the designation Stigma.

TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_M097_000_155<tab>For the further avoidance of confusion, be advised that Sir is composed of multiple distinct-but-interconnected units, each of which performs a specific function.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_N0253_000_160<tab>Bzzzt... Measuring combat capability... Result: negligible. Subject falls outside targeting parameters.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_N0253_000_161<tab>Greetings, traveler. We are the Omicrons, and our objective is self-enhancement.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_N0253_000_162<tab>In order to achieve this, we venture forth in conquest to acquire combat data and resources.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_N0253_000_163<tab>Most recently, we succeeded in subjugating the home world of the beings whose strength was said to be without parallel: the dragons.

TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_N0253_000_164<tab>Yet though the endeavor yielded a wealth of combat data, the star was rendered barren and unable to yield resources. A subsequent costing determined that the losses incurred exceeded the gains.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_N0253_000_165<tab>Since conquering the dragons, no new instructions have come from Sir, but we stand ready for deployment.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_170<tab>You learned a few things? So did I. Ere we share our findings, however, I believe it best to step outside the outpost. Come with me.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALISAIE_000_171<tab>Ah, there you are!
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALPHINAUD_000_172<tab>We've finished surveying the area. This will come as no surprise, but there was no way forward.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALISAIE_000_173<tab>There were portals like the one we used to get here, but those that worked only sent us to isolated isles.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_174<tab>Then as before, we must locate the embodiment of the emotion that bars the way.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALISAIE_000_175<tab>What of yourselves? Did you find anyone to speak with?
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALPHINAUD_000_176<tab>So the Omicrons seek to advance themselves through conquest...
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALPHINAUD_000_177<tab>Following their victory over the dragons, they stand ready for the next campaign, but their leader has yet to issue new commands. And so they wait.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_178<tab>In such a place, who could it be that fits Urianger's description? A soul whose yearning for oblivion surpasses all others...
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALISAIE_000_179<tab>Urianger said this?
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_180<tab>During our investigation, before we joined you in Elegeia.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALISAIE_000_181<tab>So that's the way of it... Why couldn't he just say it to all of us?
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALPHINAUD_000_182<tab>Given what we know of this place, it's certainly a curious state of affairs.

TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_ALPHINAUD_000_183<tab>While the dragons and the Ea longed for death, the Omicrons long for conflict. As much as that may lead to destruction, it must be considered a distinct desire.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_184<tab>In order to find the source of the dominant emotion, I believe we should seek out their leader. This “Sir.”
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_185<tab>According to M-032─the first Omicron with whom we spoke─there is a console by which we might communicate with it.
TEXT_AKTKMG110_04459_GRAHATIA_000_186<tab>M-032 also added that it would be a “pointless exercise,” but that in itself, I believe, is worth investigating. What say you?
